SYSTEM_MSG_1.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: there are [0-9]+ clusters'

SYSTEM_MSG_2.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([0-9]+,\s*)*[0-9]+'

nClusters.content: Imagine a castle with 15 rooms. Room 1, room 7, room 10, room 13, and room 11 are all connected to each other. Room 2, room 5, room 8, room 11, and room 14 are connected to each other. Room 3, room 6, room 9, room 12, and room 8 are all connected to each other. Room 4, room 7, room 10, room 13, and room 15 are connected to each other. Room 5, room 8, room 11, and room 14 are connected to each other. Room 6, room 9, room 12, and room 15 are connected to each other. Room 7, room 10, and room 13 are connected to each other. Room 8 is connected to room 14. Room 9, room 12 and room 15 are connected to each other. Room 10 is connected to room 13. Room 11 is connected to room 14. Room 12 is connected to room 15. How many densely-connected room clusters do we have in this castle? A densely-connected cluster is a group of rooms that are connected to themselves with a max of 2 rooms.

nClustersFloors.content: Imagine a castle with 15 rooms. On the first floor, room 1, room 7, room 10, and room 13 are all connected to each other. Room 4, room 7, room 10, and room 13 are connected to each other. Room 7, room 10, and room 13 are connected to each other. Room 10 is connected to room 13.  On the second floor, room 2, room 5, room 8, room 11, and room 14 are connected to each other. Room 5, room 8, room 11, and room 14 are connected to each other. Room 8 is connected to room 14. Room 11 is connected to room 14.  On the third floor, room 3, room 6, room 9, and room 12 are all connected to each other. Room 6, room 9, room 12, and room 15 are connected to each other. Room 9, room 12 and room 15 are connected to each other. Room 12 is connected to room 15.  There is a staircase that connects room 1 on the first floor to room 11 on the second floor. There is another staircase that connects room 8 on the second floor to room 3 on the third floor. There is also a staircase that connects room 15 on the third floor to room 4 on the first floor.  How many densely-connected room clusters do we have in this castle? A densely-connected cluster is a group of rooms that are connected to themselves with a max of 2 rooms.
